mapper.select: SELECT FUNDING_REVIEW_NO, FUNDING_TITLE, FUNDING_REVIEW_TITLE, MEMBER_ID, FUNDING_REVIEW_READ_COUNT, FUNDING_REVIEW_CREATE_DT FROM REVIEW_FUNDING JOIN MEMBER ON(FUNDING_REVIEW_WRITER = MEMBER_NO) JOIN FUNDING_PROJECT ON(FUNDING_BOARD_NO = FUNDING_ID) WHERE FUNDING_REVIEW_STATUS ='Y' ORDER BY FUNDING_REVIEW_NO DESC

SELECT DONATION_REVIEW_NO, DONATION_BOARD_TITLE, DONATION_REVIEW_TITLE, MEMBER_ID, DONATION_REVIEW_READ_COUNT, DONATION_REVIEW_CREATE_DT FROM REVIEW_DONATION RD LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON(RD.DONATION_REVIEW_WRITER = M.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN DONATION_BOARD DB ON(DB.DONATION_BOARD_NO = RD.DONATION_BOARD_NO) WHERE DONATION_REVIEW_STATUS ='Y' ORDER BY DONATION_REVIEW_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FV_REVIEW
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DV_REVIEW
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER JOIN ORDERS USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE ORDER_STATUS = 'Y' AND MEMBER_NO= #{memberNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DONATION_INFO WHERE INFO_MEMBER_NO=#{memberNo}

SELECT RF.FUNDING_REVIEW_TITLE, RF.FUNDING_REVIEW_CONTENT, RF.FUNDING_REVIEW_READ_COUNT, RF.FUNDING_REVIEW_CREATE_DT, RF.FUNDING_REVIEW_MODIFY_DT, M.MEMBER_ID, FP.FUNDING_TITLE, FI.FILE_PATH, FI.FILE_CHANGE_NAME, RF.FUNDING_REVIEW_NO, RF.FUNDING_BOARD_NO FROM REVIEW_FUNDING RF LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON(RF.FUNDING_REVIEW_WRITER = M.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN FUNDING_IMAGE FI ON(RF.FUNDING_BOARD_NO = FI.PARENT_PROJECT_NO) LEFT JOIN FUNDING_PROJECT FP ON(RF.FUNDING_BOARD_NO = FP.FUNDING_ID) WHERE FUNDING_REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo} AND FUNDING_REVIEW_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT RD.DONATION_REVIEW_TITLE, RD.DONATION_REVIEW_CONTENT, RD.DONATION_REVIEW_READ_COUNT, RD.DONATION_REVIEW_CREATE_DT, RD.DONATION_REVIEW_MODIFY_DT, M.MEMBER_ID, DB.DONATION_BOARD_TITLE, DA.DONATION_FILE_PATH, DA.DONATION_FILE_CHANGE_NAME, RD.DONATION_REVIEW_NO, RD.DONATION_BOARD_NO FROM REVIEW_DONATION RD LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON(RD.DONATION_REVIEW_WRITER = M.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN DONATION_ATTACHMENT DA ON(RD.DONATION_BOARD_NO = DA.DONATION_PARENT_BOARD_NO) LEFT JOIN DONATION_BOARD DB ON(DB.DONATION_BOARD_NO = RD.DONATION_BOARD_NO) WHERE DONATION_REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo} AND DONATION_REVIEW_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT FUNDING_TITLE, I.FILE_PATH, I.FILE_CHANGE_NAME, O.FUNDING_ID, M.MEMBER_ID FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN ORDERS O ON (O.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN FUNDING_PROJECT F ON(F.FUNDING_ID = O.FUNDING_ID) LEFT JOIN FUNDING_IMAGE I ON(F.FUNDING_ID = I.PARENT_PROJECT_NO) WHERE ORDER_STATUS = 'Y' AND M.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND FUNDING_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT DB.DONATION_BOARD_NO, DB.DONATION_BOARD_TITLE, DA.DONATION_FILE_PATH, DA.DONATION_FILE_CHANGE_NAME FROM DONATION_INFO DI LEFT JOIN DONATION_ATTACHMENT DA ON(DA.DONATION_PARENT_BOARD_NO = DI.INFO_BOARD_NO) LEFT JOIN DONATION_BOARD DB ON(DB.DONATION_BOARD_NO = DI.INFO_BOARD_NO) WHERE DI.INFO_MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND DONATION_BOARD_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT SEQ_F_RNO.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
SELECT SEQ_D_RNO.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL

SELECT DB.DONATION_BOARD_NO, DB.DONATION_BOARD_TITLE, DA.DONATION_FILE_PATH, DA.DONATION_FILE_CHANGE_NAME FROM REVIEW_DONATION RD LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON(RD.DONATION_REVIEW_WRITER = M.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN DONATION_BOARD DB ON(RD.DONATION_BOARD_NO = DB.DONATION_BOARD_NO) LEFT JOIN DONATION_ATTACHMENT DA ON(DA.DONATION_PARENT_BOARD_NO = DB.DONATION_BOARD_NO) WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND DONATION_REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT FUNDING_ID, FUNDING_TITLE, FUNDING_START_DAY, FUNDING_END_DAY, READ_COUNT FROM FUNDING_PROJECT WHERE FUNDING_START_DAY BETWEEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) - 1 AND SYSDATE ORDER BY READ_COUNT DESC)
WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT * FROM (SELECT FP.FUNDING_ID, FP.FUNDING_TITLE, FI.FILE_PATH, FI.FILE_CHANGE_NAME FROM FUNDING_PROJECT FP LEFT JOIN FUNDING_IMAGE FI ON(FP.FUNDING_ID = FI.PARENT_PROJECT_NO) WHERE FUNDING_FILE_CATEGORY_ID = 1 ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM())
WHERE ROWNUM <= 3

SELECT * FROM (SELECT F.FUNDING_ID, NVL(ROUND((SUM(TOTAL_PRICE)/FUNDING_GOAL) * 100), 0) AS ACHIVEMENT, F.FUNDING_TITLE , F.FILE_PATH, F.FILE_CHANGE_NAME FROM( SELECT F.FUNDING_ID, F.FUNDING_TITLE , F.FUNDING_GOAL, SUM(ORDER_REWARD_AMOUNT), REWARD_PRICE, SUM(ORDER_REWARD_AMOUNT)*REWARD_PRICE AS TOTAL_PRICE, FI.FILE_PATH, FI.FILE_CHANGE_NAME FROM FUNDING_PROJECT F LEFT JOIN ORDER_REWARD O ON (F.FUNDING_ID = O.FUNDING_ID) LEFT JOIN REWARD R ON (F.FUNDING_ID = R.FUNDING_ID) LEFT JOIN FUNDING_IMAGE FI ON(FI.PARENT_PROJECT_NO = F.FUNDING_ID) WHERE FUNDING_FILE_CATEGORY_ID = 1 GROUP BY F.FUNDING_ID, F.FUNDING_TITLE, REWARD_PRICE, FUNDING_GOAL, FI.FILE_PATH, FI.FILE_CHANGE_NAME) F GROUP BY F.FUNDING_ID, F.FUNDING_TITLE, FUNDING_GOAL, F.FILE_PATH, F.FILE_CHANGE_NAME ORDER BY ACHIVEMENT DESC NULLS LAST)
WHERE ROWNUM <= 4
